text: Gamba (Ggwe Nabbi Muhammad) nti ani yaziza e by’okwewunda bya Katonda e byo bye yawa abaddu be ne Riziki ng’ebadde nnungi, gamba nti byo n'abasiraamu bakkirizibwa okubikozesa mu bulamu obwensi, naye bigenda kubeera byabwe bokka ku lunaku lwe nkomerero, bwe tutyo nno bwe tutottola e bigambo eri abantu abamanyi
